WHAT WE DO

Our sweet spot is early stage startups, generally the first venture round, with a focus on communication, Internet and production investments. But we will also invest to partner closely with a founder at the seed stage. We support passionate individuals who aim to transform important markets or create entirely new ones.

WHAT WE BELIEVE

Partnering with exceptional entrepreneurs is ours first principle.
Amazing products can create new markets you could never analyze your way into.

we like risk and are not afraid to take it.

We invest our time and our heart, no matter the size of the check.

WHO WE ARE

We stand for entrepreneurs. We know it is their company and we act accordingly. We are a founderâ€™s strongest advocate, and their productâ€™s biggest fan. We believe strategy, design and technology go hand in hand. We take risks on brilliant people and products that move usâ€”market and model could be damned.

We keep our team small so this stays personal, because it is. And we keep our funds large enough to be able to stick with a company through the tough times and larger rounds.
